requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2 GB or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ATOLL's graphical renderer is powered by the Unity High Definition Render Pipeline (HDRP) which works best with GPUs supporting Shader Model 5.0
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or later
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ATOLL's graphical renderer is powered by the Unity High Definition Render Pipeline (HDRP) which works best with GPUs supporting Shader Model 5.0

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Big Sur
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or later
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Mac or Macbook with dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ATOLL's graphical renderer is powered by the Unity High Definition Render Pipeline (HDRP) which works best with GPUs supporting Shader Model 5.0
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Monterey
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or later
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Mac or Macbook with dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ATOLL's graphical renderer is powered by the Unity High Definition Render Pipeline (HDRP) which works best with GPUs supporting Shader Model 5.0
